>>> etc/portage/make.profile -> ../../overlay/profiles/default

>>> overlay/profiles/default/parent
../1

>>> overlay/profiles/1/parent
../2

>>> overlay/profiles/2/parent
../3

>>> overlay/profiles/default/make.defaults
USE="x"

>>> overlay/profiles/1/make.defaults
USE="a"

>>> overlay/profiles/2/make.defaults
USE="b"

>>> overlay/profiles/3/make.defaults
USE="c"

>>> expect.vars
USE="a b c x"
